section.p:
òl ... tì ... drinks tea –
Nach do dh’òl thu do thì? Cha do dh’òl. Cha do chuir thu siùcar ann.
Didn’t you drink your tea? No, I didn’t. You didn’t put sugar in it. td. 48

cuir ... ann an tì ... puts ... in tea –
Nach do dh’òl thu do thì? Cha do dh’òl. Cha do chuir thu siùcar ann.
Didn’t you drink your tea? No, I didn’t. You didn’t put sugar in it. td. 48
An do chuir thu bainne agus siùcar anns an tì? Cha do chuir.
Did you put milk and sugar in the tea? No, I didn’t. td. 238
Chuir mi siùcar anns an tì ach cha do chuir mi bainne ann.
I put sugar in the tea bit I didn’t put milk in it. td. 238
Nach do chuir thu siùcar anns an tì?
Didn’t you put sugar in the tea? td. 238

siùcar ann an tì sugar in tea –
Nach do dh’òl thu do thì? Cha do dh’òl. Cha do chuir thu siùcar ann.
Didn’t you drink your tea? No, I didn’t. You didn’t put sugar in it. td. 48
An do chuir thu bainne agus siùcar anns an tì? Cha do chuir.
Did you put milk and sugar in the tea? No, I didn’t. td. 238
Chuir mi siùcar anns an tì ach cha do chuir mi bainne ann.
I put sugar in the tea bit I didn’t put milk in it. td. 238
Nach do chuir thu siùcar anns an tì?
Didn’t you put sugar in the tea? td. 238

bainne ann an tì milk in tea –
An do chuir thu bainne agus siùcar anns an tì? Cha do chuir.
Did you put milk and sugar in the tea? No, I didn’t. td. 238
Chuir mi siùcar anns an tì ach cha do chuir mi bainne ann.
I put sugar in the tea bit I didn’t put milk in it. td. 238
